proposal: Navigating the world of parenting multiple kids is akin to mastering the chaos of a 24/7 wrestling match, where every silent night is merely the eye of a storm. With 289 holders on the ETH network, The Father of Pepe truly captures the essence of this relentless adventure. Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools, where the community can deploy and share revenue, bringing a new layer of engagement and support. Together, we can create a playground where the only midnight cries are those of joy from winning.
